Text.Page:
When you embrace Intimidation, you transform some of your existing skills and gain access to others. You can grab and hold the attention of your foes, but lose the ability to charge skills other than Thunder Strike and Vampiric Blow.

The first skill we'll master is Punishing Strike. Press the skill button for a quick upward strike, then again to attack a second time.

The Training Dummies to my left and right are vulnerable to properly executed double attacks. Destroy one, and we'll continue.

An acceptable beginning.

Our next task is mastering Overwhelm.
